Nuke配置文件文档¶

> 分析：我们将场景中需要的信息分析出来并保存到task.json中，以便进一步解析和处理

### 1.task.json解析

> 说明: 存放场景分析结果、渲染设置等信息

task.json示例

```json {

“concurrent_tasks”: “1”, “software_config”: {

“cg_version”: “12.1”, “cg_name”: “Nuke”, “plugins”: {}

}, “task_info”: {

“graphics_cards_num”: “2”, “tiles”: “1”, “project_name”: “”, “edit_name”: “test02”, “frames_per_task”: “1”, “ram”: “64”, “job_stop_time”: “259200”, “stop_after_test”: “1”, “project_id”: “0”, “time_out”: “86400”, “cg_id”: “2015”, “input_cg_file”: “D:/Myx/nuke_project/test_new_pipeline.nk”, “pre_frames”: “100”

}, “scene_info”: {

“write_nodes”: [
{

“node”: “Write3”, “inputs”: “1”, “out_file”: “D:/Myx/nuke_project/output/test_bb.mov”, “renderable”: “1”, “file_type”: “mov”, “height”: “1200”, “width”: “1920”, “proxy”: “”, “render_mode”: “0”, “option”: “0”, “frames”: “1-1[1]”, “use_proxy”: “False”

}

]

}

}¶

task.json参数解析

<table border=”1” class=”docutils”> <thead> <tr> <th>参数</th> <th>类型</th> <th>是否必须</th> <th>说明</th> <th>示例</th> </tr> </thead> <tbody> <tr> <td>software_config</td> <td>object</td> <td>Y</td> <td>渲染环境（软件类型、版本和用到的插件等）</td> <td><a href=”#software_config”>见software_config对象解析</a></td> </tr> <tr> <td>task_info</td> <td>object</td> <td>Y</td> <td>渲染设置（优先帧、渲染帧数、超时时间等）</td> <td><a href=”#task_info”>见task_info对象解析</a></td> </tr> <tr> <td>scene_info_render</td> <td>object</td> <td>Y</td> <td>场景的分析结果（场景中的渲染节点、输出路径等）</td> <td><a href=”#scene_info_render”>见scene_info_render对象解析</a></td> </tr> <tr> <td>concurrent_tasks</td> <td>string</td> <td>Y</td> <td>并发任务数</td> <td>“1”</td> </tr> </tbody> </table>

<span id=”software_config”>software_config对象解析</span>

<table border=”1” class=”docutils”> <thead> <tr> <th>参数</th> <th>类型</th> <th>是否必须</th> <th>说明</th> <th>示例</th> </tr> </thead> <tbody> <tr> <td>cg_name</td> <td>string</td> <td>Y</td> <td>软件名称</td> <td>”Nuke”</td> </tr> <tr> <td>cg_version</td> <td>string</td> <td>Y</td> <td>软件版本</td> <td>”12.1”</td> </tr> <tr> <td>plugins</td> <td>object</td> <td>Y</td> <td>插件对象。<br> 为插件名称，value为插件版本</td> <td>{}</td> </tr> </tbody> </table>

<span id=”task_info”>task_info对象解析</span>

<table border=”1” class=”docutils”> <thead> <tr> <th>参数</th> <th>类型</th> <th>是否必须</th> <th>说明</th> <th>默认值</th> <th>示例</th> </tr> </thead> <tbody> <tr> <td>graphics_cards_num</td> <td>string</td> <td>Y</td> <td>1: 开启单卡渲染 2: 开启双卡渲染</td> <td>”2”</td> <td>“2”</td> </tr> <tr> <td>cg_id</td> <td>string</td> <td>Y</td> <td>渲染软件id.”Nuke”: “2015”</td> <td></td> <td>”2015”</td> </tr> <tr> <td>ram</td> <td>string</td> <td>Y</td> <td>内存要求: 64 / 128</td> <td>“64”</td> <td>”64”</td> </tr> <tr> <td>input_cg_file</td> <td>string</td> <td>Y</td> <td>渲染场景本地路径</td> <td></td> <td>”D:/Myx/nuke_project/test_new_pipeline.nk”</td> </tr> <tr> <td>job_stop_time</td> <td>string</td> <td>Y</td> <td>设置帧的超时时间，只会影响当前帧, 单位秒</td> <td>“259200”</td> <td>”28800”</td> </tr> <tr> <td>user_id</td> <td>string</td> <td>N</td> <td>用户ID</td> <td></td> <td></td> </tr> <tr> <td>pre_frames</td> <td>string</td> <td>Y</td> <td>优先渲染(优先帧不建议自定义多个单独帧)</td> <td>“000”</td> <td>”000:1,3-4[1]” 表示： 优先渲染首帧：否 优先渲染中间帧：否 优先渲染末帧：否 优先渲染自定义帧：1,3-4[1]</td> </tr> <tr> <td>tiles</td> <td>string</td> <td>Y</td> <td>分块数量，大于1就分块或者分条，等于1 就是单机</td> <td>”1”</td> <td>”1”</td> </tr> <tr> <td>project_id</td> <td>string</td> <td>Y</td> <td>项目id</td> <td></td> <td>”0”</td> </tr> <tr> <td>project_name</td> <td>string</td> <td>Y</td> <td>项目名称</td> <td>” “</td> <td>””</td> </tr> <tr> <td>frames_per_task</td> <td>string</td> <td>Y</td> <td>一机渲多帧的帧数量</td> <td>”1”</td> <td>”1”</td> </tr> <tr> <td>stop_after_test</td> <td>string</td> <td>Y</td> <td>优先渲染完成后是否暂停任务 “1”:优先渲染完成后暂停任务 “2”.优先渲染完成后不暂停任务</td> <td>”2”</td> <td>“2”</td> </tr> <tr> <td>task_id</td> <td>string</td> <td>N</td> <td>任务号</td> <td></td> <td></td> </tr> <tr> <td>task_stop_time</td> <td>string</td> <td>Y</td> <td>大任务超时停止 单位秒,”0”表示不限制</td> <td>”0”</td> <td>”86400”</td> </tr> <tr> <td>time_out</td> <td>string</td> <td>Y</td> <td>超时时间 单位秒</td> <td>“43200”</td> <td>”43200”</td> </tr> </tbody> </table>

<span id=”scene_info_render”>scene_info_render对象解析</span>

<table border=”1” class=”docutils”> <thead> <tr> <th><strong>参数</strong></th> <th><strong>类型</strong></th> <th><strong>是否必须</strong></th> <th><strong>说明</strong></th> <th><strong>示例</strong></th> </tr> </thead> <tbody> <tr> <td><strong>write_nodes</strong></td> <td><strong>object</strong></td> <td><strong>Y</strong></td> <td><strong>层信息</strong></td> <td><strong><a href=”#scene_info_render.layer”>见scene_info_render.layer对象解析</a></strong></td> </tr> </tbody> </table>

<span id=”scene_info_render.write_nodes”>scene_info_render.write_nodes对象解析</span>

<table border=”1” class=”docutils”> <thead> <tr> <th>参数</th> <th>类型</th> <th></th> <th>说明</th> <th>示例</th> </tr> </thead> <tbody> <tr> <td>node</td> <td>string</td> <td>Y</td> <td>节点名称</td> <td>”Write3”</td> </tr> <tr> <td>proxy</td> <td>string</td> <td>N</td> <td>代理输出路径</td> <td>”P:/UW/Update_17/Shot_2/Shot_02_####.png”</td> </tr> <tr> <td>frames</td> <td>string</td> <td>Y</td> <td>是否使用默认相机，默认值为‘1’(使用默认相机)</td> <td>”1-1[1]”</td> </tr> <tr> <td>out_file</td> <td>string</td> <td>N</td> <td>输出路径</td> <td>”P:/UW/Update_17/Shot_2/Shot_02_####.png”</td> </tr> <tr> <td>inputs</td> <td>string</td> <td>N</td> <td>当前输出节点是否有输入源</td> <td>”0”: 无， “1”：有</td> </tr> <tr> <td>file_type</td> <td>string</td> <td>N</td> <td>输出文件格式</td> <td>”mov”</td> </tr> <tr> <td>render_mode</td> <td>string</td> <td>Y</td> <td>渲染输出模式，默认为0;<br />0 use scene settings；<br />1 render full resolution；<br />2 render using proxies</td> <td>“0”</td> </tr> <tr> <td>width</td> <td>string</td> <td>Y</td> <td>输出分辨率宽</td> <td>”9348”</td> </tr> <tr> <td>height</td> <td>string</td> <td>Y</td> <td>输出分辨率高</td> <td>”2242”</td> </tr> <tr> <td>use_proxy</td> <td>string</td> <td>N</td> <td>场景是否开启了代理模式:<br /> “False”：不开启；<br />”True”：开启;</td> <td>”False”</td> </tr> <tr> <td>renderable</td> <td>string</td> <td>Y</td> <td>是否渲染:<br />“0”: 否<br />“1”：是</td> <td>”1”</td> </tr> <tr> <td>option</td> <td>string</td> <td>Y</td> <td>渲染类型:<br />”-1”:正常渲染，单机单帧渲染;<br />”0”:输出视频类型，会单机渲染所有帧;</td> <td>”0”</td> </tr> </tbody> </table>
